enchantment.cranks-dungeons.lunge.desc: Jab attacks propel the wielder forward
enchantment.cranks-dungeons.riptide.desc: Launches the user when used in water or rain,
replacing the trident's ability to be thrown
enchantment.cranks-dungeons.wind_burst.d: Causes a powerful upward knockback effect
upon smash attack, does not negate fall damage
